# Pseudo-classes ðŸ‘»

Keywords added to selectors that specify a **state**.

## Syntax
`selector:pseudo-class { ... }`

## Common Examples
```css
a:link    { color: blue; }     /* Unvisited */
a:visited { color: purple; }   /* Visited */
a:hover   { color: red; }      /* Mouse over */
a:active  { color: yellow; }   /* Clicked */

input:focus { border: 2px solid blue; } /* Selected input */
```
